content:
# The error indicates that I cannot craft a stone furnace because I lack the necessary stone resource, which needs to be gathered first.
# It seems I need to gather stone before I can craft the stone furnace.

# Let's find the nearest stone resource and gather enough to craft the stone furnace. 
# I will first locate the nearest stone resource.

nearest_stone_position = nearest(Resource.Stone)  # Find the nearest stone resource position.
print(f'Nearest Stone Position: {nearest_stone_position}')  # Print the coordinates of the nearest stone resource.

# Now, I will move to the nearest stone position and gather the required amount of stone (at least 3).
move_to(nearest_stone_position)  # Move to the nearest stone resource position.
